name: Quit Genius
slogan: We help people quit addictions, starting with nicotine
description:
Our story started when our co-founders, whilst working as medical doctors, recognized that the holistic textbook version of medicine was not at all what was being provided for patients. The reality is that a stretched healthcare system fails to engage people in their medical care at the preventative stages.

As a result, the $3 trillion currently spent on healthcare goes on to prevents only 10% of premature deaths. With digital therapeutics, we have the opportunity to prevent 40% of premature deaths that are caused by behavioral patterns.

Quit Genius is a behavior change platform that combines digital coaching, personalized content, wearable technology and medication to help people overcome addictive behaviors.

team.title: CEO
team.name: Yusuf Sherwani
team.bioHtml: Co-Founder & CEO @Quit Genius, Doctor @Imperial College London. Previously founded @Unique Melody

team.name: Maroof Ahmed
team.bioHtml: Co-Founder and COO @ Quit Genius. Forbes 30 Under 30. Y Combinator W18. Medical Doctor.

jobs.title: UX/UI Designer
jobs.description:
The Speed Read ðŸ“–

Weâ€™re a super high growth health-tech startup building mobile apps that can change peopleâ€™s behaviour. Our flagship app, Quit Genius, is a new way to quitting smoking that delivers highly personalised therapy at scale. Weâ€™ve won design awards from Apple, already helped tens of thousands of people quit smoking and scaled a platform to a million users. Weâ€™ve raised funding from Y Combinator, Merck & Co and Village Global (backed by Jeff Bezos, Mark Zuckerberg and Bill Gates).

Weâ€™re building a company that will go beyond smoking cessation and build a portfolio of products across the addiction and mental health space. A new kind of digital first pharmaceutical company!

What We Need ðŸš€

Weâ€™re looking for ambitious designers who are in it for the long-run and passionate about using their super powers to make a positive contribution to the world. We constantly experiment to discover what makes our users tick, and we take a data-driven approach to product development.

What Youâ€™ll Be Doing ðŸŽ¨

- You will work with our highly cross-functional team of PMs, engineers, psychologists and medical doctors to craft craft outstanding user experience with highly appealing visual design.
- Help define and drive the future of Quit Genius interfaces and user experience.
- Manage multiple design projects and ensure project contribution meets business goals.
- Implement a user experience that is cohesive and consistent across the entire mobile and web platforms.
- Work closely with product teams and help them to test and validate new features from mockups to end-interfaces.
- Find improvements to the current user experience and be a strong advocate for an elegant, accessible and innovative interface.
- Be supported throughout the process by leading design and product managers across London and San Francisco.

Benefits ðŸ˜Ž

- Work with a talented, passionate and ambitious team of doctors, designers and technologists.
- Opportunity to significantly contribute to key decisions in the development of the app and the business as a whole.
- Gaining first-hand experience of what it takes to scale a successful business.
- Highly flexible work schedule.
- The opportunity to make a big impact. What we do saves lives.

jobs.title: Lead Psychologist at Quit Genius
jobs.description:
Quit Genius (www.quitgenius.com) is an award-winning mobile therapy program to help smokers quit for good. Since launching in June 2017 we've experienced incredible user growth (over 900,000 users) and are already the world leaders in smoking cessation. The app works - weâ€™ve published 3 peer-reviewed papers and have already helped over 80,000 people quit smoking, for good. What we do saves lives and hearing all the incredibly positive feedback from our users on a daily basis is incredibly rewarding.

Our team is made up of doctors, designers and engineers who have a passion to make a positive impact on the lives of people around the world. We're a team of lifelong learners and we want to work with like-minded people who care about devoting their time to building products that can have a real impact on the lives of millions of people around the world.

We're looking for a Lead Psychologist who can take full ownership of our quit coaching within the app. As well as directly supporting users who want to quit smoking (text-based chat), you will help manage a team of Quit Coaches and support our clinical research trials. This is a high priority role in which you will report directly to the executive team.

You will:

- Regularly speak to users through our text-based chat platform and support them on their journey to quitting smoking.
- Help manage a team of remote quit coaches. 
- Support the delivery of our clinical research studies, including the development, implementation and management of clinical trials.
- Apply principles of CBT to create new programme content.
Work with the product team to help iterate on the current coaching platform.

You may be right for this role if you:

- Have a strong background in Psychology (minimum undergraduate degree) with at least one year experience in the delivery of therapy in a clinical setting.
- Have experience in working on clinical trials and/or health-related research (e.g. ethics, consent, manuscript preparation and submission etc.).
- Have strong organisational and communication skills, and can work autonomously. Initiative and creativity are absolutely critical in our company.
- Have strong academic and non-academic writing skills.

Benefits:

- Work with a talented, passionate and ambitious team of doctors, designers and technologists.
- Highly flexible work schedule. Unlimited paid holidays. Flexible working hours.
- A fun place to work with regular socials.
- Opportunity for rapid progression as the company scales.
- Opportunity to significantly contribute to key decisions in the development of the app and the business as a whole.
- Gaining first-hand experience of what it takes to scale a successful business.
- Work in the heart of London (near Farringdon and Chancery Lane Station).
- The opportunity to make a big impact. What we do saves lives.

Please read all the above and only apply if you meet all the requirements. Please submit your full CV to maroof@digithera.ai with a detailed cover letter outlining your experience and an explanation of why you are suitable for this role.

jobs.title: Content Marketing Manager
jobs.description:
Quit Genius is on a mission to empower people to quit their addictions and become the best version of themselves.  
Our flagship program is an all-in-one tobacco cessation/e-cigarette program that combines digital therapy, nicotine replacement therapy and wearable technology to deliver holistic support to smokers looking to quit.  
We have reached a pivotal stage in our growth and have the unique opportunity to build a dominant position in a hyper-growth market. In a short space of time, we have scaled our platform to over a million users and a dozen enterprise clients. Quit Genius is the only digital addiction program validated in a Randomized-Controlled Trial (RCT) with a further 6 peer-reviewed research studies published.   
Quit Genius has raised $14M to-date and our investors include leading venture capital funds such as Y Combinator, Semper Virens and Village Global (backed by Jeff Bezos, Mark Zuckerberg and Bill Gates).

jobs.title: Director, Enterprise Marketing
jobs.description:
Quit Genius is on a mission to empower people to quit their addictions and become the best version of themselves.  
Our flagship program is an all-in-one tobacco cessation/e-cigarette program that combines digital therapy, nicotine replacement therapy and wearable technology to deliver holistic support to smokers looking to quit.

Quit Genius has raised $14M to-date and our investors include leading venture capital funds such as Y Combinator, Semper Virens and Village Global (backed by Jeff Bezos, Mark Zuckerberg and Bill Gates).  
In your role as Director of Growth Marketing, you will design and implement trend-setting new campaigns that increase Quit Genius' reach, and thus enable more people to live healthier, happier lives. The ideal candidate will have a track record of building a hands-on B2B marketing strategy to generate leads and accelerating sales opportunities to deal close by creating hyper-personalized multi-channel marketing campaigns.  
In your application, please include links to examples and outcomes of your successful B2B marketing campaigns.

We are looking for an experienced sales executive to help drive growth by closing key accounts. In this role, the candidate will help drive growth and shape the future of an emerging service that will have a significant impact on our business and the digital health care industry at large. Our ideal candidate will be a strong relationship builder and has a strong track record of sales success. Must be open to regular travel.Â Â

jobs.title: NHS Partnerships Manager
jobs.description:
We are a fast growing health-tech startup helping people quit addictions by facilitating access to cognitive behavioural therapy through a mobile app. Our flagship app, Quit Genius, is a new way to quit smoking that delivers highly personalised therapy at scale.  
What we do saves lives. We have published groundbreaking results demonstrating the effectiveness of Quit Genius in multiple peer-reviewed research studies and have helped over 100,000 people quit smoking to date.  
We are building a company that will go beyond smoking cessation and build a portfolio of products across the addiction and mental health space. We've won design awards from Apple, already helped hundreds of thousands of people quit smoking and scaled a platform to a million users. We've raised $14.1 million of funding from Octopus Ventures, Y Combinator, Merck & Co and Village Global (backed by Jeff Bezos, Mark Zuckerberg and Bill Gates).  
**About the Role**  
In this role, your overarching responsibility will be to help manage the existing relationships we have delivering stop smoking services for the NHS. You will be responsible for our UK partnership strategy, execution and overall management of partner relationships. You will also be one of the most contributors to building out new partnerships in the UK, so you will have a unique opportunity to shape Quit Genius' commercial strategy. Â   
The ideal candidate will have a managing client relationship and different stakeholders within the NHS, as well as experience driving new business through the tender process. We are most interested in someone who is naturally curious, ambitious, and excited to be an early member of a growing team. Above all, we are looking for someone motivated to help us positively impact the lives of millions.  
  
Your responsibilities:- Own a portfolio of Quit Genius NHS clients; and define and execute a Quit Genius client success strategy to increase retention and ensure that clients get value out of the Quit Genius platform- Maintain and develop collaborative relationships with Quit Genius partners with all key stakeholders at all levels- You'll be responsible for building out new partnerships (stop smoking services, local authorities and lead providers) and drive revenue in the UK- You will help manage the bid writing process in the application of tenders- Collaborate closely with internal teams including Product, Operations, Sales, to drive successful adoption, utilization and engagement of Quit Genius and act as the voice of the customer- Drive client success in tangible metrics (e.g. improved quit smoking outcomes, retention and renewals, product expansion, etc.)  
Our requirements:- 2+ years of experience managing projects and stakeholder relationships within the NHS - Experience writing bids for the tender process- Experience managing internal and external stakeholders in a healthcare setting - Deep understanding of the healthcare space- A process-focused approach, with strong problem-solving skills and keen attention to detail- Strong interpersonal, relationship-building and listening skills, with a natural, effective consultative style- Engaging presentation skills, and the desire to lead strategic projects with high visibility- Bonus: experience directly within public health and smoking cessation  
Why you'll love working at Quit Genius:- Competitive salary- Pension scheme- Health and dental insurance- Weekly socials and an awesome team culture - Flexible work from home and remote days- The chance to join a high-growth startup- The opportunity to develop and grow fast along with the business, and learn a whole lot along the way- Work in a central London office with a bunch of fun and inspiring people (with a barista-style coffee machine)- We promote good work-life balance  
Due to the large number of applications we receive, we will only be able to respond to successful candidates.

What we do saves lives. We have published groundbreaking results demonstrating the effectiveness of Quit Genius in multiple peer-reviewed research studies and have helped over 100,000 people quit smoking to date.

jobs.title: Product Designer
jobs.description:
**The Speed Read**  
Weâ€™re a super high growth health-tech startup building mobile apps that can change peopleâ€™s behaviour. Our flagship app, Quit Genius, is a new way to quit smoking that delivers highly personalised therapy at scale. Weâ€™ve won design awards from Apple, already helped tens of thousands of people quit smoking and scaled a platform to a million users. Weâ€™ve raised funding from Y Combinator, Merck & Co and Village Global (backed by Jeff Bezos, Mark Zuckerberg and Bill Gates).  
Weâ€™re building a company that will go beyond smoking cessation and build a portfolio of products across the addiction and mental health space. A new kind of digital-first pharmaceutical company!  
**What We Need**  
Weâ€™re looking for an experienced UX designer to join our product team. Behaviour change is core to what we do, and creating a seamless experience that helps turn negative behaviours into positive ones will be a focus.  
Responsibilities may include:Helping define the customers' and the business problemsInteracting directly with users and identifying new findings and learningsWire-framing and validating the design solutions with the development teamBuilding high-fidelity designsEngaging in ongoing design reviews and refining the design guidelines for the productÂ Getting quick user feedback and iterating on designs based on feedbackA balance from building new products and features from the ground up and iterating/optimising current features sets  
**You**  
Have the ability to design for iOS, Android and Web platformsHave experience in participating/leading user researchAre a self-starter - you take initiative in spotting opportunities and finding ways to solve challenges using design principlesHave a strong UX focus and curiosity about human behaviourA passion to solve real world problems  
**Benefits**  
Work with a talented, passionate and ambitious team of doctors, designers and technologistsOpportunity to significantly contribute to key decisions in the development of the product and the business as a whole.Gaining first-hand experience of what it takes to scale a successful business.Highly flexible work schedule.The opportunity to have a big impact. What we do saves lives.

jobs.title: Sales Development Representative
jobs.description:
Quit Genius is on a mission to empower people to quit their addictions and become the best version of themselves.Â Our flagship program is an all-in-one tobacco cessation/e-cigarette program that combines digital therapy, nicotine replacement therapy and wearable technology to deliver holistic support to smokers looking to quit.Â   
We have reached a pivotal stage in our growth and have the unique opportunity to build a dominant position in a hyper-growth market. In a short space of time, we have scaled our platform to over a million users and a dozen enterprise clients. Quit Genius is the only digital addiction program validated in a Randomized-Controlled Trial (RCT) with a further 6 peer-reviewed research studies published.Â We have also demonstrated industry leading quit rates.   
Quit Genius has raised $14M to-date and our investors include leading venture capital funds such as Y Combinator, Semper Virens and Village Global (backed by Jeff Bezos, Mark Zuckerberg and Bill Gates).Â   
We are looking for a Sales Development Representative to join our sales team. In this role, you will lead the generation of qualified leads for our Account [Executives.You](http://Executives.You) will be the first point of contact for the Quit Genius sales team and will generate interest and demand for the Quit Genius product to large self-insurance employers and consultants. You will help drive growth and shape the future of an emerging service that will have a significant impact on our business and the digital healthcare industry at large. Our ideal candidate will be a strong relationship builder and has a passion to make a positive impact on the lives of millions.Â

We see partnerships are one of the most important contributors to our revenue growth, so you will have a unique opportunity to shape Quit Genius' commercial strategy.  
The ideal candidate has Health Plan and/or Benefit Consultant sales experience and is an expert at building deep relationships with various channel partners.Â

Our flagship program is an all-in-one tobacco cessation/e-cigarette program that combines digital therapy, nicotine replacement therapy and wearable technology to deliver holistic support to smokers looking to quit.

We have reached a pivotal stage in our growth and have the unique opportunity to build a dominant position in a hyper-growth market. In a short space of time, we have scaled our platform to over a million users and a dozen enterprise clients. Quit Genius is the only digital addiction program validated in a Randomized-Controlled Trial (RCT) with a further 6 peer-reviewed research studies published.

Quit Genius has raised $14M to-date and our investors include leading venture capital funds such as Y Combinator, Semper Virens and Village Global (backed by Jeff Bezos, Mark Zuckerberg and Bill Gates).

As VP, Partnerships & BD, you are responsible for channel partnership strategy, execution, and overall management of partner relationships. We see partnerships are one of the most important contributors to our revenue growth, so you will have a unique opportunity to shape Quit Genius' commercial strategy.

The ideal candidate has Health Plan and/or Benefit Consultant sales experience and is an expert at building deep relationships with various channel partners.
